name: Quotes from 'The Fall's Gonna Kill You' Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Oliver Babish to ____: "I don't care if you trust me or not!"
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	Six hours after CJ found out about the President's illness, Oliver talked to CJ in his office about her press briefings when she had to discuss the President's health. CJ wanted to know why she should trust him since he's only been White House Counsel for three months.

Leo.

	Josh and Leo discussed the case against the tobacco company and how the Assistant General needed more money for the lawsuit. Josh wanted to okay thirty million dollars to be given to the lawyers, but Leo didn't want to give them the money because he knew they would lose the case.

questions.text: "A satellite is crashing to Earth and NASA sent us a fax?"
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Outside of Josh's office, Donna ran into Ed and Larry laughing over a fax they received from NASA about a satellite named Zodiac that was  hurdling toward Earth. Donna thought Josh should sound the alarm to warn people.

questions.text: "It seems the little experience I do have is with dead lawyers."
questions.explanation:
Abbey.

	Oliver questioned Abbey about the health form she signed for Zoey when she went to Georgetown. Abbey told him that she signed lots of forms and she doesn't remember if the President was in the room when she signed it.

Toby.

	Sam ran into Toby in the cafeteria and he told Sam about the newspaper article written by Maynard Watchel that describes them as Batman and Robin. Sam said the article doesn't do that and Toby said it should and that Sam would be Robin.

questions.text: "We need to get back to fundamentals."
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	In the Roosevelt room, Sam made the quote during discussion of the tax speech the President was going to give in Chicago. The aides in the room with him tried to find the quote in the speech, but Sam had just come up with it.

questions.text: Who was this quote said about? "Can you and I be men? Can we have a bond?"
questions.explanation:
President Bartlet and Leo.

	President Bartlet made this quote while talking to Leo about Zoey's health form which was signed by Abbey. Leo told Abbey about the form thinking President Bartlet had told her, but he soon found out he hadn't.

questions.text: "We think Americans are eating more beets."
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh told Leo that he was making people (including Joey) think that he was going to her about a poll to see if Americans are eating more beets. Later when Josh meets with Joey, she asks him if Americans are eating more beets and he says they are. Josh really went to Joey to tell her about the President's MS and to get her to put a poll out seeing how people felt about an undisclosed illness. Joey told Josh she would make the poll about the Governor of Michigan.

questions.text: "Well, I have to tell you it'll be the first time I've been asked out in quite awhile."
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	Since CJ reported on the President's health during her press briefings, Oliver Babish questioned her about how she worded the President's health to the press. Oliver explained to CJ that she would not only have to answer these questions from him but by a Grand Jury when the Justice Department subponea's her for her part in the MS scandal.

questions.text: CJ to ____: "It's the fall that's gonna kill ya!"
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh walked CJ part of the way home and explained to her what they were going to do with the poll and he mentioned that Leo was worried that the polling was going to hurt them. CJ laughed and said that the polling wasn't what was going to hurt them. "It's the fall that's gonna kill ya!"
